fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The image of every definable function is a set.
fr:mainmatter.fr:tex: (\forall x.\mkern 5mu\exists y.\mkern 5mu\varphi (x,y)) \wedge (\forall x,y,y'.\mkern 5mu\varphi (x,y) \wedge \varphi (x,y') \Rightarrow y = y') \Rightarrow \\ \forall u.\mkern 5mu\exists v.\mkern 5mu\forall y.\mkern 5muy \in v \iff \exists x.\mkern 5mux \in u \Rightarrow \varphi (x,y)
